name: gitbridge-web-extension
description: Automatically clone and jump from Github/Gitlab/Bitbucket to VSCode in one click !

scripts.build: yarn clean && npx tsc && yarn webpack
scripts.package: yarn usebash && yarn clean:package && zip -rD --exclude='src/*.ts' gitbridge.xpi dist/bundles icons src manifest.json
scripts.package:dev: yarn clean:dev && yarn package && unzip gitbridge.xpi -d gitbridge.webextension
scripts.package:chrome: yarn clean:chrome && yarn package:dev && yarn crx3 gitbridge.webextension -o gitbridge.crx && yarn clean:dev
scripts.clean:all: npx rimraf dist node_modules gitbridge.* yarn-*.log
scripts.make:chrome: yarn install && yarn build && yarn package:chrome
scripts.make:dev: yarn install && yarn build && yarn package:dev
